speaker: PORTIA
text:
Inquire
               
              the
               
              Jew’s
               
              house
               
              out
              ;
               
              give
               
              him
               
              this
               
              deed

speaker: PORTIA
text:
And
               
              let
               
              him
               
              sign
               
              it
              .
              
                 
                She
                 
                gives
                 
                Nerissa
                 
                a
                 
                paper
                .
              
               
              We’ll
               
              away
               
              tonight
              ,

speaker: PORTIA
text:
And
               
              be
               
              a
               
              day
               
              before
               
              our
               
              husbands
               
              home
              .

speaker: PORTIA
text:
This
               
              deed
               
              will
               
              be
               
              well
               
              welcome
               
              to
               
              Lorenzo
              .

speaker: GRATIANO
text:
Fair
               
              sir
              ,
               
              you
               
              are
               
              well
               
              o’erta’en
              .

speaker: GRATIANO
text:
My
               
              Lord
               
              Bassanio
              ,
               
              upon
               
              more
               
              advice
              ,

speaker: GRATIANO
text:
Hath
               
              sent
               
              you
               
              here
               
              this
               
              ring
              ,
               
              and
               
              doth
               
              entreat

speaker: GRATIANO
text:
Your
               
              company
               
              at
               
              dinner
              .

speaker: PORTIA
text:
That
               
              cannot
               
              be
              .

speaker: PORTIA
text:
His
               
              ring
               
              I
               
              do
               
              accept
               
              most
               
              thankfully
              ,

speaker: PORTIA
text:
And
               
              so
               
              I
               
              pray
               
              you
               
              tell
               
              him
              .
               
              Furthermore
              ,

speaker: PORTIA
text:
I
               
              pray
               
              you
               
              show
               
              my
               
              youth
               
              old
               
              Shylock’s
               
              house
              .

speaker: GRATIANO
text:
That
               
              will
               
              I
               
              do
              .

speaker: NERISSA
text:
Sir
              ,
               
              I
               
              would
               
              speak
               
              with
               
              you
              .

speaker: NERISSA
text:
Aside
                 
                to
                 
                Portia
                .
                 
              
              I’ll
               
              see
               
              if
               
              I
               
              can
               
              get
               
              my
               
              husband’s
               
              ring
              ,

speaker: NERISSA
text:
Which
               
              I
               
              did
               
              make
               
              him
               
              swear
               
              to
               
              keep
               
              forever
              .

speaker: PORTIA
text:
Thou
               
              mayst
              ,
               
              I
               
              warrant
              !
               
              We
               
              shall
               
              have
               
              old
               
              swearing

speaker: PORTIA
text:
That
               
              they
               
              did
               
              give
               
              the
               
              rings
               
              away
               
              to
               
              men
              ;

speaker: PORTIA
text:
But
               
              we’ll
               
              outface
               
              them
              ,
               
              and
               
              outswear
               
              them
              ,
               
              too
              .
              —

speaker: PORTIA
text:
Away
              ,
               
              make
               
              haste
              !
               
              Thou
               
              know’st
               
              where
               
              I
               
              will
               
              tarry
              .

speaker: NERISSA
text:
Come
              ,
               
              good
               
              sir
              ,
               
              will
               
              you
               
              show
               
              me
               
              to
               
              this
               
              house
              ?
